website_summaries.verdict: While the self-propelled drive is difficult to adjust to the perfect speed, this is a powerful mower that combines ruggedness with ease of use.
pros: Composite deck minimizes rust and makes for a lighter mower
Powerful 190cc engine that runs efficient and quiet
cons: Setting the deck and cutting level requires a bit of work
Buyers report some problems with the self-propelled drive either breaking or running too fast or too slow

customer_reviews.title: This product is not worht your money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the product in Jun 2018. It was non operational by Aug 2018. I have a flat yard and cut the lawn once a week. Very disappointed, After normal use the mechanism to engage the blades does not work making the lawn mower useless. Contacted Amazon, who referred me to the seller CPO, who told me it is not their problem and I should seek my own recourse with the manufacturer Honda. $900 piece of junk. Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: WV

customer_reviews.title: Best mowing capabilities I have ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: Best mowing capabilities I have ever seen! Even and mulches grass and debris into little pieces. If you like mulching than this is the mower to get. I also like how easy it starts and how I can have the engine running while I pick up items in the yard around me. It is a heavier mower than I am use to though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quality mower.
customer_reviews.text: This is superlative lawnmower! I love it. Easy to use and always starts. I am a female using it my only suggestion is that they make the grips for the blade and speed smaller for all types of hands.
customer_reviews.author: SSC

customer_reviews.title: great lawn mower , fast delived from fex
customer_reviews.text: Best lawn mower ---pickup ever thing up in bag --- thank you amazon Happy
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower
customer_reviews.text: The mulching on this mower is great. Even wet grass didn't clump. I had a Toro mower that was good but this mower is do much better at mulching. The drive mechanism is solid and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve A

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Successfully mows my lawn, lightweight, easy to start, easy to clean. If it's still running in ten years I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bunolagus

customer_reviews.title: It was very good I really like my lawn more is a five ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very good I really like my lawn more is a five star
customer_reviews.author: willie bowens

customer_reviews.title: Very annoying. The speed control is hard to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: The blade brake releases unexpectedly, despite holding the handle properly. Very annoying. The speed control is hard to get used to. The mower is always speeding up and slowing down.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J.

customer_reviews.title: Bad self propel,no response from Honda customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mower in April of 2017.I started having self propel problems in July 2017 Ihad the mower serviced in November 2017,the problem was the self propel would decrease in speed and it would make aloud wining noise.they said they adjusted the cables.I did not need the mower again until April 2018,it still had the same problem.I took it back and they replaced the transmission fluid.It worked fine for 1 month and it started doing the same thing again.I contacted Honda customer service on 7/2/18,still no response.Maybe they should take care of customer complaints,and not just take their money.
customer_reviews.author: oohrah67

customer_reviews.title: The mulching system does not work very well
customer_reviews.text: Versa mow system does not work. A 1/4 inch gap exists around the edge of the mulch baffle which allows grass to go into the bag at the end of the day when I'm done mowing my lawn I have an entire bag full of grass...when my handle is set to full mulch. This is not mulching..... I contacted Honda and they say they know of No Such condition and have no fixes and place after spending $700 on the mower I don't feel this is a very good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: LoafTheTabby

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mower in every way except one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mower in every way except one: the self-propelled feature works extremely well--for about 10 minutes. I have a half-acre lawn, and upon start-up, the self-propelled feature is superb. I have to run to keep up with the mower. After a couple passes, however, the mower gradually and steadily slows down, and within 15 minutes it is essentially a push mower--a VERY HEAVY pushmower. I've taken it to the Honda certified dealer twice in two years, and they don't see anything wrong with it. A great mower is rendered almost inoperable by this glaring deficit. Never again will I buy a Honda mower.
customer_reviews.author: Rick
